ygData.subject: Re: Bertoxx Shadow Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: Growing older has given me my limits. I can t seem to do this for more than three hours. My but starts to hurt and I get a headache from eye-strain. But fear
ygData.messageBody:
Growing older has given me my limits. I can't seem to do this for
more than three hours. My but starts to hurt and I get a headache
from eye-strain. But fear not, intrepid adventurers. I turn 50 in a
few days. Most of you probably have years before you start to fall
apart.

Good hunting, all.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Enie" <dawn_marie@m...> wrote:
> Thanks for the info :) This game is so much fun. I am going to have
> to start limiting myself tho - I found myself online from 6:00PM
> until 11:30PM last night and the hours flew by :(
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Fire on High" <scendera@o...>
> wrote:
> > Oh yes, one other thing...there are putrid skellies in SK that
give
> hits
> > against Blood Sabers...might want to avoid those. They're at a
camp
> a few
> > hundred feet straight south of the zone from NK.
> > ----- Original Message -----

possible
> to fix

in

other
> ones.

> > Shadow
> > > Knights are followers of Bertoxx as well and might welcome you
as
